title: GDG DevFest Ahmedabad 2016 Summary
brief: GDG DevFest Ahmedabad 2016 is now over. It was a great success. We are happy to share with you some facts, emotions and, of course, photos from the biggest Google Developers Conference in Gujarat!

title: GDG DevFest 2017 Announced
brief: Ahmedabad Google Developers Groups are proud to announce the fifth annual GDG DevFest 2017 which is the biggest Google related event in Ahmedabad carefully crafted by GDG community! The event will take place on **5th November** in **Ahmedabad**.

title: Call for Papers Time
brief: GDG DevFest Ahmedabad 2017 has been announced! The 5th edition of the biggest conference about Google technologies in Ahmedabad will take on **5th November** in an ancient city of Gujarat. That means that it is time to open [call for talk submissions](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSeg41OhfG4cQnB17l7zztuA28S1rOuMH6Q3-VUq94yVoZVu4w/viewform).
